properties.title: Smart Contract Interaction
properties.shortDescription: Guide existing or new members to interact with your Smart Contracts. Perfect for testing new features, as well as improving community engagement in actions valuable for the growth and credibility of your Nova.
properties.longDescription: Guide existing or new members to interact with your Smart Contracts. Perfect for testing new features, as well as improving community engagement in actions valuable for the growth and credibility of your Nova.
